Something's fishy in PA

Something’s fishy in PA {#h.u91cywso60t0 .zfr3Q .OmQG5e dir=”ltr” style=”text-align: center;”}

{#h.ki7ymv2hldvw .zfr3Q .OmQG5e dir=”ltr” style=”text-align: center;” tabindex=”-1”}

PA Nursing Home C19 deaths 80% of all C19 deaths in PA? What’s going on? They overprotect the young & healthy and underprotect the frail and vulnerable.
